Title: Handling Non-Original Content on Xiaohongshu
Content: When dealing with non-original content on Xiaohongshu, there are two main approaches to consider. The first method involves modifying your material using editing software like Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro to make it appear original. This includes changing aspects such as angles, lighting, and other visual elements. The second method is creating 'pseudo-original' content. This involves replicating the style and format of successful posts but shooting the material yourself. By doing so, you avoid directly copying others' work, which can lead to violations. It's crucial to understand that while these methods can help in the short term, the platform strongly supports original content. Therefore, for long-term success, focus on creating genuinely original posts. This not only aligns with the platform's guidelines but also helps in building a sustainable and credible account.

Title: Importance of Original Content for Long-Term Success
Content: Creating original content is essential for long-term success on Xiaohongshu. The platform actively supports and promotes original content by offering various incentives like promotional coupons and increased visibility. These incentives are designed to encourage users to produce unique and engaging content. When you invest in creating original posts, you not only comply with the platform's guidelines but also build a more authentic and trustworthy brand. Original content is more likely to attract genuine engagement from users, leading to higher interaction rates and better overall performance. Additionally, original posts are less likely to face issues during promotional activities, as the platform conducts thorough checks on content that is boosted through paid promotions. Therefore, focusing on originality from the start can save you from potential setbacks and help you establish a strong presence on the platform.

Title: Transitioning from Non-Original to Original Content
Content: Transitioning from non-original to original content is a strategic move that can significantly enhance your Xiaohongshu account's performance. Initially, if you lack the resources or skills to create original content, you can start by modifying existing material or creating pseudo-original posts. This involves using editing software to alter the content or replicating successful formats with your own footage. However, as your account grows and you gain more experience, it's crucial to shift towards producing original content. Start by investing in basic equipment and learning the fundamentals of content creation. You can also collaborate with others or hire professionals to help you produce high-quality posts. Over time, this transition will not only improve your account's credibility but also align with the platform's emphasis on originality. By gradually increasing the proportion of original content, you can build a sustainable and engaging presence on Xiaohongshu.
